npcSpeech.text: Ah Hello! It's good to see you again!
Here's another tip. Don't touch those spikey things. They are super dangerous.
Let me show you how it's done then! Should I show you how to move left or down?
Ah, you're in the way. I'll go left.
Forget I said any of that... I didn't mean it...
You're doing a fine job. Keep it up.
... No ones ever asked me that before... I suppose there's one... but I don't know if it makes sense.

It's something that has been bothering me for a few days. I do not know why, it's so illogical anyway... I was wondering why we slide. Why do we keep moving till we hit a rock or rough? Why should a step be meaured that way... in a direction. Shouldn't we be able to choose to take a step that is smaller. And if so how small can our steps be!
